Document: # Placeholder's recommended to start with the [color=#a4885c]Controls[/color] guide, and then read the [color=#a4885c]Character Creation[/color], [color=#a4885c]Roleplaying[/color], and [color=#a4885c]Jobs[/color] guides. Not all jobs or concepts will have guides yet, and it's strongly encouraged to help us write them if you're an experienced player!
